ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm.....that would be nice.  I ll have to look into that tonight maybe.
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm.....that would be nice. I'll have to look into that tonight maybe.

> ----------
> From: Trevalien[SMTP:trevalien@...]

> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Crafted items (some idiot)
>
> From: "Trevalien" <trevalien@...>
>
> >Hehe, indeed I have a large bag with my 5 cha items (2 + 7 bracelets, + 5
> >amulet (thunder or merit, forget which), mystic doll (+ 3), and a silk
> >shirt
> >+ 5) and one slot free for putting my grotesque mask into. My cha goes
> >from
> >57 (grot mask and mino ribcage give - 9 each) to 102 with my cha gear on.
>
> >I
> >want to upgrade my mystic doll to a crude stein, putting me at 109, that
> >should be good enough.
>
> I think the crude stein is +15 chr (i may be wrong) but that would give u
> 114 chr i think.
>
> Trevalien
